text: elections folding and depositing ballot amend rsa ii to read as follows the provisions of paragraph i shall not apply in cities and towns which use one or more electronic ballot counting devices for the counting of ballots as provided in rsa in cities and towns which use one or more electronic ballot counting devices for the counting of ballots any ballot that has been folded after the voter has marked the ballot shall not be counted using such electronic ballot counting devices such ballots shall be set aside and counted by hand in accordance with rsa after the close of the polls processing absentee ballots depositing ballot amend rsa to read as follows opening envelope depositing ballot if the absentee ballot is not challenged the moderator shall after announcing the name of the voter open the envelope containing the ballot so the affidavit is not destroyed the moderator shall then take the ballot out of the envelope without unfolding the ballot or without permitting the ballot to be examined and he or she shall preserve the affidavit with the ballots cast at the election as provided in rsa the moderator shall then have a checkmark placed beside the name of the absentee voter on the checklist and write therewith the letters a in red ink and shall then deposit the ballot in the ballot box no folded absentee ballot shall be counted using an electronic ballot counting device all absentee ballots that have been folded shall be set aside and counted by hand after the close of the polls
